question: Cuba shares the location at the confluence of which three waterbodies?
option1: Pacific Ocean, Gulf of Alaska and Caspian Sea
option2: Pacific Ocean, Gulf of Mexico and Caribbean Sea
option3: Atlantic Ocean, Gulf of California and Beaufort Sea
option4: Atlantic Ocean, Gulf of Mexico and Caribbean Sea
answer: Atlantic Ocean, Gulf of Mexico and Caribbean Sea
explanation: Cuba is located in the northern Caribbean Sea at the confluence with the Gulf of Mexico and the Atlantic Ocean. Cuba shares maritime borders with the USA to the north and north-west; the Bahamas to the north; Mexico to the west; Haiti to the east; Jamaica and the Cayman Islands to the south.
